overview: Emily Brooks, this voluptuous redhead, was smiling, bending over and wrapping herself up like a pretzel all day long. At this hot August show in Indiana, over 70 strippers from the Midwest and feature dancers from all over the nation showed off their tans and a whole lot more for the roving cameras of John Stagliano, Big John and myself. The girls compete for cash and prizes during the day in categories such as Miss Nude North America, Best Breasts and our favorite, Best Buns.
title: Buttman at Nudes 'a Poppin' 15
